title: UI Dashboard (Read-Only v1, Config-Ready)
goals: Provide a single place to view weekly summaries and release verification results.
Display run history with status, duration, and trigger source.
Allow repo, schedule, and recipient management via API endpoints.
Link to Grafana Tempo traces and Sentry errors for each run.
nonGoals: In-UI editing of prompts, channels, or credentials (later).

behavior: Dashboard page shows summary tiles and latest outputs feed.
Runs page shows table with filters for repo, job type, status, and date range.
Run Detail page shows rendered summary, raw JSON, artifacts, and observability links.
Repositories page supports add/remove, schedule updates, recipient updates, and read-only prompt display.
Schedules page lists cron schedules and next run time.
UI is internal, unauthenticated in v1, and read-only except repo/schedule/recipient updates.
Polling interval defaults to 30s if no push mechanism is used.
obs: Expose Tempo trace URLs and Sentry event URLs in run detail when available.

accept: UI renders runs list and run detail from API.
Repo list and schedule management are functional via API.
Design matches clean admin dashboard expectations.
assume: UI is internal and unauthenticated in v1.
UI is read-only except repo add/remove, schedule updates, and recipient updates.
Polling interval defaults to 30s if no push mechanism is used.
